Comment: I'm afraid for how many congresspeople don't understand enough to know what's he's doing.  It's as if the president started a bank, and persuaded the government of the United Arab Emirates to deposit $2 billion into his bank, and to charge it all on his bank's VISA card.  Also, news of the deal spiked the share price of his bank, and he owns 75% of the shares.  So his 1-year old bank gains legitimacy and liquidity, he earns a transaction fee, and the value of his shares in the bank shoot up.  While he's the president.
